TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ADODC.ErrorDelegate(int errorNumber, ref string description, int scode, string source, string helpFile, int helpContext, ref bool cancelDisplay);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/ErrorDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Sub ADODC.ErrorDelegate(errorNumber As Integer, ByRef description As String, scode As Integer, source As String, helpFile As String, helpContext As Integer, ByRef cancelDisplay As Boolean)
public: delegate void ADODC::ErrorDelegate(int errorNumber, System::String ^ % description, int scode, System::String ^ source, System::String ^ helpFile, int helpContext, bool % cancelDisplay);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

span.span: An that represents the error number.
A that contains the error message.
An that represents the error source.
A that represents the source name.

param.name: helpFile
param.span: 一个表示错误帮助文件的 。

span.span: A that represents the Help file for the error.

param.name: helpContext
param.span: 一个 ，表示帮助主题的上下文 ID。

span.span: An that represents the context ID for a Help topic.

param.name: cancelDisplay
param.span: 一个 ，用于确定用户是否可以取消错误对话框。

span.span: A that determines whether the user can cancel the error dialog box.

summary.span: 表示将处理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
